response.overview: Wake up. Function as a normal human being. Sleep. Wake up. Function as a normal human being. Sleep.  Day in and day out, we find ourselves in the monotony of life: self help books, work, family, friends, cars, house, medications... Most of us are simply trying to live a "normal" life. Have you ever found yourself wondering whether or not the goal of life should be normalcy?  Now is the time to Stop and Think.
response.title: Stop & Think
